entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
